short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ig zero pro removes  mass followers on Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this tool, you can remove more followers on Instagram whom you do not follow. It is possible to remove between 100 and 200 followers per day. 

How to use this extension?

Step 1: First you need to login to your Instagram account on your Chrome browser.

Step 2: Click on the extension and add it to your Chrome browser.

Step 3: Now you need to click the "Load followers" option.

Step 4: Here you can see the list of followers and you can select to remove the followers.
